text: Striders Impex Limited operates through offices and warehouses primarily located in Mumbai, to support its operations. Our registered office is situated in Maharashtra.
Our location is staffed with qualified personnel responsible for overseeing day-to-day operations, compliance, and coordination. Details of our registered office are as below:
